Plot: A group of unwitting teens are stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.
Title: House of Wax
Writer: Charles Belden (story), Chad Hayes (screenplay), Carey Hayes (screenplay)
Actors: Elisha Cuthbert, Chad Michael Murray, Brian Van Holt, Paris Hilton
tomatoConsensus: Bearing little resemblance to the 1953 original, House of Wax is a formulaic but better-than-average teen slasher flick.
